mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM om_org a WHERE a.ORG_CODE = ${org_code}
mapper.sql: guid, org_code, org_name, org_type, org_degree, org_status, org_level, guid_parents, org_seq, org_addr, zipcode, link_man, link_tel, email, start_date, end_date, area, create_time, last_update, updator, sort_no, isleaf, sub_count, remark
